quoteLast: that he would have to withdraw from that school. Thereupon two members of that body, residing in the district of the timorous teacher, resigned.

quoteLast: . I thought we'd get our letters after our breakfast, and then carry them across the bridge with us. Would you like to do that? I have to cross the bridge every morning.
